prompts.prompt: For the sender {emailAddress}, summarize all unread emails from the past {days} days: include the main topics, the number of emails, and any detected urgency or follow-up actions.

template.name: sender-unread-summary
template.description: Summarizes unread emails from a specific sender in a time window, highlighting topics, volume, and possible urgency.

arguments.name: emailAddress
arguments.description: The email address of the sender.

arguments.name: days
arguments.description: The number of past days to include in the summary.

prompts.prompt: Review my last 10 flagged emails and suggest three actionable follow-ups. For each, briefly describe the email and recommend the most urgent next step.

template.name: flagged-emails-followup
template.description: Analyzes recent flagged emails and proposes concrete next actions for each.

prompts.prompt: List my unread emails with attachments from the past {days} days. For each, summarize the sender, subject, and suggest if the attachment needs urgent review.

template.name: unread-attachments-review
template.description: Helps the user quickly scan and prioritize unread emails with attachments for a recent time window.

arguments.name: days
arguments.description: Number of days in the past to review.

prompts.prompt: Analyze my recent sent emails to {recipientName} and suggest if there are any open threads or required follow-ups, including missed replies or pending attachments.

template.name: sent-emails-followup
template.description: Scans recent sent emails to a specific recipient for unfinished conversations or missing actions.

arguments.name: recipientName
arguments.description: The display name or email address of the recipient.
